TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class Integer : Java.Lang.Number, IConvertible, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.Lang.IComparable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Integer extends Java.Lang.Number implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.Lang.IComparable, class System.IConvertible, class System.IDisposable
type Integer = class inherit Number interface IComparable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IConvertible

Docs.summary: The Integer class wraps a value of the primitive type int in an object.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Compares two Integer objects numerically.
Docs.returns: the value 0 if this Integer is equal to the argument Integer; a value less than 0 if this Integer is numerically less than the argument Integer; and a value greater than 0 if this Integer is numerically greater than the argument Integer (signed comparison).
